statements.query: MATCH (kandjidevice:KandjiDevice), (crowdstrikehost:CrowdstrikeHost) WHERE kandjidevice.serial_number =  crowdstrikehost.serial_number MERGE (kandjidevice)-[r:HAS_SERIAL]->(crowdstrikehost) ON CREATE SET r.firstseen = $UPDATE_TAG SET r.lastupdated = $UPDATE_TAG
statements.__comment__: Establish relationship between KandjiDevice and CrowdstrikeHost
